modName: Change any NPC into an Argonian
descriptionHtml:
Here it is A Mod to change NPC\'s into argonians Still trying to figure out a way to make it perminent. but for now it is still temporary.

As requested by alot of you here is a command that changes NPC\'s into argonians enjoy

Installation & use
1.Extract Argonian.txt into your skyrim/data folder
2.Start skyrim
3.open up console \"`\"
4.click any npc that you want to be argonian
5.type bat argonian

there the NPC should be argonian!

ZW6
author: JeremyPettis
